Projects.Title: Projects
Projects.CF1C: This App requires the use of global and local states, react router, protect routes with the use of TOKEN and has communication with the Spotify API.
Projects.CF2C: This project uses axios, redux and React Router, to be able to consume the Pokemon API and display the pokedex, allowing filtering by type and name, allowing you to modify the number of Pokemon displayed per page.
Projects.CF3C: This app was created with React and Vite and it need to use the Rick and Morty API, This project has as its base concepts the use of entries, lists and keys in conjunction with conditional rendering.
Projects.CB1C: This project was carried out using Express, Sequelize and SQL, it allows using CRUD for users, categories, products, carts and purchases.
